name: Haywire (unityforandroid@gmail.com)
description:
Your Robot has gone Haywire and you're the only one that can save it! Use the controls to guide it to safety through a series of challenges that will put your brain power to the ultimate test.

  • -Navigate your way through tricky mazes and unique enemies
  • -Think outside the box to solve complex puzzles
  • -Experience hair-raising close calls as you push your reflexes to their limits
  • -Find stars along the way to unlock new levels and other surprises
  • -Collect coins to buy new robots and upgrade them
  • -The diverse control system allows you to plan out your moves ahead of time by placing actions directly on the path of your robot

Developed and Designed by Plain Games
